text:
Mr. Ralph Hall, Coordinator
Audio Visual Center
Kent State University
Kent, Ohio
Dear Ralphs
None of us will be at the DAVI Convention from Headquarters. Dick Hull will
be there (NAEB Vice President) if you’d like to tap him.
X have no problems to bring up. Think we’re making progress together.
Sincerely,
HJSidfc
Harry J. Skarnia
Executive Director
